name: Hero WWR 2: Shooter Mission
description:
Hero WWR 2: Shooter Mission is a first person shooting game with realistic battlefield to fight with terrorists for survival. Do you want to be a part of world war II battle fighting 2018? If yes then welcome to this realistic classic world war survival shooting mission game. Get ready & play as a fps shooter hero to kill your enemy like gangster and terrorists commando in this world war superhero fighting game
Features:

• Thrilling Action packed survival game!
• Engaging war survival FPS Shooting missions!
• Fight hard and Escape prison in World War II battleground!
• An escape strategy will make you real war survival hero!
• Variety of war weapons and rifles to combat against rivals!
